creator: Simya Solutions Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD FREE - LEARN WITH GAMES - SPEAK WITH NATIVE SPEAKERS

Our free Hungarian language learning app is designed to make learning Hungarian as easy and as fun as possible! Using a variety of mini games and interactive learning techniques, you’ll be able to immerse yourself in the Hungarian language using just your smartphone!

Whether you’re a complete beginner and don’t know any Hungarian words and you want to learn the basics of the language, or you’re already pretty fluent and want to learn advanced Hungarian or brush up on your knowledge – Ling has you covered!

Traditional Hungarian language lessons can be boring, dull and no fun at all. At Ling, we’ve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges and quizzes to teach you how to read, write and speak Hungarian!

-------------------------------------------------------
OUR HUNGARIAN TEACHING MINI GAMES…
-------------------------------------------------------
- Flashcards
- Word quizzes
- Chatbot to practise conversation
- Speaking to improve your pronunciation
- Writing practice using your finger and smartphone screen
- Review what you have learned
- Dialogue: Practical conversation in real life
- Match pictures with the corresponding word
- Sort sentences into the correct order
- Complete the unfinished sentence
… And much, much more!

With so many different mini games, challenges, quizzes and puzzles to teach you Hungarian, you’ll have hours of fun learning a new language. It may not feel like learning at all!

--------------------------------
LING – HIGHLIGHTS
--------------------------------
- User friendly interface is easy to navigate
- Individual courses covering different aspects of the Hungarian language
- Courses for all fluency levels, from absolute beginner to very advanced
- Mini games, flashcards, challenges and interactive games to help you learn much faster
- Learn Hungarian using an app that was made by Hungarian natives
- Assess yourself on Hungarian speaking and pronunciation
- Learn useful Hungarian grammar while playing fun games
- Learn how to write the Hungarian alphabets
- Learn how to speak about a variety of different topics
